title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via pip install ollama and chat with local models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm install ollama to integrate local LLMs into web/node apps.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama integration to LangChain; swap OpenAI calls for local Ollama models in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; run docker compose up and get a polished, multi-user interface for any local model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates for Ollama.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, integrations and ecosystem news.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for private code completion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama generator & embedder nodes to Haystack pipelines for local RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven artifact lets JVM apps chat with local models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate exposing async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API for Cargo projects.

title: ollama-camunda-bridge
summary: Community bridge exposing Ollama models as Camunda external tasks for low-code AI workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU inference plus Open WebUI variant.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Community tool to convert & push Hugging Face models into Ollama’s model library format.
